property.value: World-space swing disabled by default (f0496df) — local-space is the active path. _worldSwingAxis is never set when _useWorldSpaceSwing=false, so pre-condition always fails. Re-enable this test only if world-space mode is restored as the default.

reason.message: World-space swing disabled by default (f0496df) — local-space is the active path. _worldSwingAxis is never set when _useWorldSpaceSwing=false, so pre-condition always fails. Re-enable this test only if world-space mode is restored as the default.
